Recipe.Title: Perfect Steaks
Recipe.Comments: This is the best way to cook a good steak. Serve with sautéed onions and mushrooms

Ingredients.Item: Choice boneless prime steaks about 1 inch thick

Directions.Step: Salt and pepper the steaks on both sides. Let the steaks come to room temperature
Heat a 12 inch cast iron skillet for at least 2 minutes over high heat.
Place the steaks in the hot skillet. Cook for 2 minutes. Do not move the steaks around in the pan
Turn the steaks over and place the skillet into the oven
Cook for about 15 minutes or until the steaks reach an internal temperature of 125º for medium rare.
Rest the steaks for 5 minutes, then serve.
